TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ContentControlStoreUpdatingEventArgs

summary.span: 为内容控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of a content control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序和事件。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 此示例假定文档包含名为`plainTextContentControl1`，它绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素。This example assumes that the document contains a named `plainTextContentControl1` that is bound to an element in a custom XML part. 有关演示如何将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素的代码示例，请参阅[演练： 将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md)。For a code example that demonstrates how to bind a content control to an element in a custom XML part, see [Walkthrough: Binding Content Controls to Custom XML Parts](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md). 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于 C# 中，你必须还将附加到的事件处理程序和的事件`plainTextContentControl1`。For C#, you must also attach the event handlers to the and events of `plainTextContentControl1`. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/CS/ThisDocument.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/VB/ThisDocument.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取文本，它正保存到与内容控件绑定的自定义 XML 部件中。

span.span: Gets the text that is being saved to the custom XML part that is bound to the content control.

value.span: 正保存到与内容控件绑定的自定义 XML 部件中的文本。

span.span: The text that is being saved to the custom XML part that is bound to the content control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将内容控件绑定到一种 XML 中的元素 (也名为*自定义 XML 部件*) 嵌入在文档中。You can bind content controls to an element in a piece of XML (also named *custom XML part*) that is embedded in the document. 使用属性可以在 Microsoft Office Word 更新绑定到控件的自定义 XML 部件之前更改文本。Use the property to change the text before Microsoft Office Word updates the custom XML part that is bound to the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[自定义 XML 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序和事件。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 此示例假定文档包含名为`plainTextContentControl1`，它绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素。This example assumes that the document contains a named `plainTextContentControl1` that is bound to an element in a custom XML part. 有关演示如何将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素的代码示例，请参阅[演练： 将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md)。For a code example that demonstrates how to bind a content control to an element in a custom XML part, see [Walkthrough: Binding Content Controls to Custom XML Parts](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts.md). 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于 C# 中，你必须还将附加到的事件处理程序和的事件`plainTextContentControl1`。For C#, you must also attach the event handlers to the and events of `plainTextContentControl1`. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/CS/ThisDocument.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/VB/ThisDocument.vb#7)]
